attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Lobbying from Big Companies and their agents be completely transparent to the electorate at any time and place(at Libraries)to discourage profiteering from peoples health and other matters concerning wellbeing and life enhancement. this would also discourage cover-ups and malicious profiteering at our expense.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
